forth.def: DUP 0= DROP DUP 1 = DROP LIT, DUP 2 = DROP LIT, EXEC, 1- SWAP LIT, LIT, GERM EXEC,
DUP 0= DROP EXECUTE DUP 1 = DROP EXEC, DUP 2 = DROP LIT, EXEC, 1- SWAP LIT, LIT, GERM EXEC,
DUP 0= DROP DUP 1 = DROP SLIT, DUP 2 = DROP SLIT, EXEC, 1- -ROT SLIT, LIT, GERM EXEC,
DUP 0= DROP DUP 1 = DROP 2LIT, DUP 2 = DROP 2LIT, EXEC, 1- -ROT 2LIT, LIT, GERM EXEC,
